subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Joey Gilbert agreed to pay a $10,000 fine for a positive steroid test as part of a settlement with the Nevada Athletic Commission that will allow him to return to the ring as soon as Sept. 22. Gilbert agreed Tuesday to the fine and a one-year suspension retroactive to his last fight nearly a year ago. Gilbert (16-1), a middleweight, gained attention on the NBC reality series “The Contender” in 2005.
